poolTricks.name: Belly Flop
poolTricks.description: The jumper lands flat on their stomach. Often unintentional and potentially painful.

poolTricks.name: Back swim
poolTricks.description: Swim on your back across the pool

poolTricks.name: Butterfly Handstand
poolTricks.description: Do a handstand underwater with legs spread

poolTricks.name: Surf
poolTricks.description: Put a float under your feet and surf on it.

poolTricks.name: Cowboy Ride
poolTricks.description: Ride a float like a cowboy. Yee-haw!

poolTricks.name: Dance Party
poolTricks.description: Have a dance party in the pool

poolTricks.name: Belly On Bottom
poolTricks.description: Lay on your belly on the bottom of the pool

poolTricks.name: Floor is Lava
poolTricks.description: The floor is lava! Get out of the pool!

trampolineTricks.name: Seat Drop
trampolineTricks.description: A basic trick where the jumper bounces and lands in a sitting position with legs straight, then bounces back to their feet.

trampolineTricks.name: Swivel Hips
trampolineTricks.description: From a seat drop, the jumper spins 180 degrees and lands in another seat drop facing the opposite direction.

trampolineTricks.name: Back Drop
trampolineTricks.description: The jumper lands on the trampoline on their back and immediately rebounds back to their feet.

trampolineTricks.name: Jump forward
trampolineTricks.description: Jump forward.

trampolineTricks.name: Knee Flip
trampolineTricks.description: Jump to your knees and do a flip.

trampolineTricks.name: Spin
trampolineTricks.description: Do a spin move.

trampolineTricks.name: No Hands Flip
trampolineTricks.description: Do a flip without using your hands.

trampolineTricks.name: Split
trampolineTricks.description: Do a split.

trampolineTricks.name: Run in Circle
trampolineTricks.description: Run in a circle.

trampolineTricks.name: Play Dead
trampolineTricks.description: Play dead.

trampolineTricks.name: Car Crash
trampolineTricks.description: Do a car crash.

trampolineTricks.name: Rock Drop
trampolineTricks.description: It's like a cannonball

trampolineTricks.name: Front Walkover
trampolineTricks.description: Jump to the middle with your hands and then go backwards.

trampolineTricks.name: The Worm
trampolineTricks.description: The worm.

trampolineTricks.name: Straight Legged Seat Drop
trampolineTricks.description: Jump high and do a straight legged seat drop and bounces back up to their stomach.

trampolineTricks.name: Kick up. Stand up.
trampolineTricks.description: Get on your back and kick up to stand up.

trampolineTricks.name: Air Kick
trampolineTricks.description: Jump and do a kick

trampolineTricks.name: Pin the Tail
trampolineTricks.description: Close your eyes and try to find the location called out.

trampolineTricks.name: N.S.E.W.
trampolineTricks.description: Jump in each direction from the center. North, South, East, and West.

trampolineTricks.name: Fall Game
trampolineTricks.description: Fall on Command. While singing 'Fall Game. Fall Game.'

trampolineTricks.name: Slipping Split
trampolineTricks.description: Jump and do a split, but land on your back.

trampolineTricks.name: Split and Twirl
trampolineTricks.description: Jump and do a split, then twirl around in the air before landing.

trampolineTricks.name: Sit and Twirl
trampolineTricks.description: Sit on the trampoline and spin around in a circle while bouncing slightly.

trampolineTricks.name: Sit, Twirl, and Plank
trampolineTricks.description: Sit on the trampoline, spin around in a circle, and then transition into a plank position while bouncing slightly.

trampolineTricks.name: Statue
trampolineTricks.description: Jump and freeze in a pose, like a statue, before landing.

trampolineTricks.name: Around the Wold
trampolineTricks.description: Running around in a circle while singing 'Around the World'.

trampolineTricks.name: Popcorn
trampolineTricks.description: Jump and bounce around like popcorn popping.

trampolineTricks.name: Jumping Jacks
trampolineTricks.description: Do jumping jacks while bouncing on the trampoline.

trampolineTricks.name: Strike a Pose
trampolineTricks.description: Jump and strike a pose in mid-air before landing.
